variables.label: i
variables.name: inclination — angle between the orbital plane and equatorial plane (deg)

variables.label: p
variables.name: perigee (point of orbit closest to Earth)

variables.label: RA
variables.name: right ascension — arc measured eastward along the celestial equator from the vernal equinox (deg)

variables.label: σ
variables.name: declination — angular distance north or south of the celestial equator (deg)
